idea-plugin.name: Base16 Spaceduck
idea-plugin.vendor: Guillermo Rodriguez (https://github.com/pineapplegiant), packaged by Gabriel Fontes (https://github.com/Misterio77), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Spaceduck for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Guillermo Rodriguez (https://github.com/pineapplegiant), packaged by Gabriel Fontes (https://github.com/Misterio77). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
